articles.description: With Matheus Cunha's transfer from Wolves to Manchester United at an advanced stage, BBC Sport looks at the impact the Brazil forward can make at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Matheus Cunha: Why does Wolves forward want Man Utd move & where does he fit?

articles.description: Emma Raducanu has never beaten Iga Swiatek. How does she go about shocking the 'Queen of Clay' in the French Open second round?
articles.title: French Open 2025: How Emma Raducanu will look to stun Iga Swiatek at Roland Garros

articles.description: Lamine Yamal signs a new six-year Barcelona contract following a breakout season in which he helped the Catalan club win a domestic treble.
articles.title: Lamine Yamal contract: Barcelona forward signs new six-year deal until 2031

articles.description: Liverpool boss Arne Slot thanks "the wider football community" for its support as he is named manager of the year and Premier League manager of the year at the LMA awards.
articles.title: Arne Slot: 'Football is a source of comradeship,' says Liverpool boss

articles.description: Great Britain's Jack Draper recovers from a sluggish start against Mattia Bellucci to secure the first French Open win of his career.
articles.title: French Open 2025: Jack Draper beats Mattia Bellucci for first Roland Garros win of his career

articles.description: Mohamed Salah says he can play until he is 40 years old and is still in talks about a possible future move to the Saudi Pro League.
articles.title: Mo Salah: Liverpool forward plans to play until 40

articles.description: Novak Djokovic begins his latest bid for a record-breaking 25th Grand Slam singles title with a commanding win over Mackenzie McDonald.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Novak Djokovic makes winning start to latest bid for history

articles.description: Matti Schmid achieved his best ever PGA Tour finish on Sunday, but his putting technique is facing increasing scrutiny.
articles.title: Matti Schmid reignites broom-handle golf putter debate on PGA Tour - Iain Carter column

articles.description: American world number two Coco Gauff forgets her racquets before her French Open first-round match before going on to beat Olivia Gadecki.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Coco Gauff forgets racquets before sealing straight-set win, Mirra Andreeva through

articles.description: Few international retirements have shocked women's football in the way Mary Earps' decision did.
articles.title: 'Cool' legacy of Mary Earps after shock international retirement
